Title: Cyrano, My Love
Writer: Alexis Michalik (adaptation), Alexis Michalik (dialogue), Alexis Michalik (original idea), Alexis Michalik (play), Alexis Michalik (screenplay)
Actors: Thomas Solivérès, Olivier Gourmet, Mathilde Seigner, Tom Leeb
Plot: December 1897, Paris. Edmond Rostand is not yet thirty but already two children and a lot of anxieties. He has not written anything for two years. In desperation, he offers the great ...
